text: But the LORD’s1:3 When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name. angel said to Elijah the Tishbite, “Arise, go up to meet the messengers of the king of Samaria, and tell them, ‘Is it because there is no God1:3 The Hebrew word rendered “God” is “אֱלֹהִ֑ים” (Elohim). in Israel that you go to inquire of Baal Zebub, the god of Ekron?
